DOC.brief_summary: This study Phase 2 trial test efficacy LY686017 treatment Social Anxiety Disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison LY686017 With Marketed Drug Treatment Social Anxiety Disorder
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient least 18 year age 65 year age . Must sign inform consent document . Present Visit 1 social anxiety disorder base Clinical Global ImpressionSeverity score great equal 4 . Females childbearing potential ( surgically sterilize menarche 1 year postmenopause ) must test negative pregnancy time enrollment base urine pregnancy test agree use reliable primary method birth control . Judged reliable willing keep appointment clinic visit , test , procedure require protocol . Have comorbid Axis I disorder ( major depression , obsessive compulsive disorder , posttraumatic stress disorder , panic disorder ) , opinion investigator , disorder occur within last 6 month . Have previous current diagnosis bipolar disorder , schizophrenia , psychotic disorder . Have presence Axis II disorder , except avoidant personality disorder . Have serious medical illness . Have abnormal thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) concentration take thyroid supplement .
